title: Incorrect 'low on space' notification
content:
I have only had my Pixel 3 for less than a month, but already when I delete a photo by it comes up with a notification "Delete item permanently? Your device is low on space. This item will be permanently deleted from your device and account."
I have checked my device storage and it says I've only used 32GB of 128GB. I have checked my Google One account storage and it says I've only used just over 1GB of 15GB.
Any ideas what is going on?
